PerfectNetExp.abs: ...械接触力(mechanical　force　of　contact)；其三，工具痕迹是机械作用的结果。所谓后效(aftereffect)，就是物体受力作用后的效果。也就是说，当工具或代用工具与其它物体作用时，如果这种作用只引起物体发生“.

entry.tran: 后效；事后影响；副作用；后遗症
entry.def: The after-effects of an event, experience, or substance are the conditions which result from it.

example.ex: ...people still suffering from the after-effects of the world's worst nuclear accident...
example.tran: 仍然因世界上最严重的核事故留下的种种后果而饱受折磨的人们

example.ex: He was suffering from shock as well as the after-effects of drugs.
example.tran: 他在受着毒品毒副作用影响的同时还出现了休克。

means.word_mean: 1. any result that follows its cause after an interval
2. a delayed effect of a drug or therapy;

auth_sentence.content: This color-adaptation aftereffect occurs mainly in the retina.
auth_sentence.res_content: This color-adaptation aftereffect occurs mainly in the retina.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This color-adaptation aftereffect occurs mainly in the retina.

auth_sentence.content: The principle of motion adaptation isn't all that different from the one illustrated by the color aftereffect.

means.word_mean: 后果, 事后影响，余波

sentences.en: He was at a party all night and felt the aftereffects, a headache and a stomachache, the next day.
sentences.cn: 他在晚会上玩了个通宵，第二天才觉出头痛、胃痛的后果。

sentences.en: a drug with no aftereffect or side effect
sentences.cn: 一种无后效或副作用的药物
